name: Ras Mohammed National Park Snorkeling
description: Egypt's premier marine reserve with stunning coral reefs, diverse marine life, and the famous Magic Lake. Includes boat trip with multiple snorkeling stops, lunch, and national park entry.
bookingTip: Full Egyptian visa may be required (outside free tourist zone)

name: Tiran Island Boat Trip
description: Part of the protected coral reef system in the Red Sea. Crystal-clear waters with some of the best snorkeling and diving in the region. Most tours include multiple reef stops and fresh seafood lunch.
bookingTip: Book with hotel for best prices - often includes pickup

name: White Island & Ras Mohamed Cruise
description: Pristine sandbar paradise surrounded by turquoise waters, perfect for swimming and photos. Combined with Ras Mohamed snorkeling for the ultimate day trip.
bookingTip: Great for Instagram photos - bring waterproof camera

name: Desert Safari & Quad Biking
description: Race across sand dunes on quad bikes, visit a Bedouin camp for traditional tea, watch the sunset, and enjoy a BBQ dinner under the stars with stargazing.
bookingTip: Book sunset tour for best experience

name: Blue Hole & Dahab Day Trip
description: Visit the famous Blue Hole diving site and the charming beach town of Dahab. Includes Colored Canyon hike and free time to explore Dahab's hippie vibe.
bookingTip: Leave early - it's a 1.5 hour drive each way

name: Mount Sinai Sunrise Hike
description: Ascend the mountain where Moses received the 10 Commandments. Watch a spectacular sunrise from 2,285m, then descend to visit St. Catherine's Monastery (UNESCO World Heritage Site).
bookingTip: Bring warm layers - very cold at summit. Starts at night.

name: Naama Bay Beach & Promenade
description: The heart of Sharm El Sheikh with beautiful beaches, restaurants, shops, and vibrant nightlife. Perfect for evening strolls, shopping, and dining.
bookingTip: Visit in evening for cooler temps and atmosphere

name: Old Market (Sharm El-Maya)
description: Traditional shopping hub with local handicrafts, souvenirs, spices, and authentic Egyptian products. Great for bargaining and picking up unique gifts.
bookingTip: Bargain hard - start at 50% of asking price

name: Glass Bottom Boat Tour
description: See underwater life without getting wet. Clear-bottomed boats allow passengers to observe reefs and marine creatures as they glide across the sea. Ideal for families and non-swimmers.
bookingTip: Perfect for families with young children

name: El Fanar Beach & Lighthouse
description: Beautiful beach club with direct reef access for snorkeling. Great house reef right off the shore - perfect for those who want snorkeling without a boat trip.
bookingTip: Best snorkeling directly from shore in SSH

name: Farsha Cafe Sunset Experience
description: Iconic clifftop cafe with cushions built into the rocks, overlooking the Red Sea. Perfect for sunset drinks and shisha with stunning views. Unique bohemian atmosphere.
bookingTip: Arrive 30 min before sunset for best seats

name: Shark's Bay Beach
description: Protected bay with calm waters and excellent snorkeling. Many hotels line this bay, and the jetty walk is famous for reef fish spotting.
bookingTip: Walk the jetty at sunrise for best fish viewing
